institution-wrap.institution: National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases
University of Texas Southwestern Medical Center

funding-group.funding-statement: This work was supported by the Department of Pediatrics and The Sarah M. & Charles E. Seay Chair in Pediatric Infectious Diseases, The University of Texas Southwestern Medical Center, Dallas, Texas. This work was also supported by the National institutes of Health (grant R21 AI126109-01 (PI: Kahn). The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
